Name: Verify Fundraising Information for Altlayer Coin on Coin Tabs
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the Altlayer coin page. Proceed to the fundraising section and verify the displayed information.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://dropstab.com/
step 2: Click on button 'menu-trigger-stock market timeframe'
step 3: Click on link 'TRX\n11\nTRON' -> Navigate to page 'coins/tron'
step 4: Click on span
step 5: Click on link 'Blockchain' -> Navigate to page 'categories/blockchain'
step 6: Click on p
step 7: Click on link 'Cryptocurrencies' -> Navigate to page ''
step 8: Click on link 'Investors & VCs\nNew' -> Navigate to page 'investors'
step 9: Click on button 'Search\n/'
step 10: Enter input value in input field 'search'
step 11: Click on link 'global-search-items-coin-58832' -> Navigate to page 'coins/altlayer'
step 12: Click on link 'coin-tabs-item-fundraising' -> Navigate to page 'coins/altlayer/fundraising'
step 13: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Binance Labs Investors Information
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the investors section. Select Binance Labs from the list of investors and verify the displayed information.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://dropstab.com/
step 2: Click on button 'menu-trigger-stock market timeframe'
step 3: Click on link 'TRX\n11\nTRON' -> Navigate to page 'coins/tron'
step 4: Click on span
step 5: Click on link 'Blockchain' -> Navigate to page 'categories/blockchain'
step 6: Click on p
step 7: Click on link 'Cryptocurrencies' -> Navigate to page ''
step 8: Click on link 'Investors & VCs\nNew' -> Navigate to page 'investors'
step 9: Click on link 'Binance Labs' -> Navigate to page 'investors/binance-labs'
step 10: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Information for A16z Andreessen Horowitz on Polychain Capital Investors Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the investors section. Select A16z Andreessen Horowitz from the list of investors and verify the displayed information.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://dropstab.com/
step 2: Click on link 'Investors & VCs\nNew' -> Navigate to page 'investors'
step 3: Click on link 'a16z (Andreessen Horowitz)' -> Navigate to page 'investors/polychain-capital && investors/*'
step 4: Click on button '2'
step 5: Click on button 'Search\n/' -> Navigate to page 'investors/*'
step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
